headline: Jim Cramer on Albemarle: “It’s Too Volatile”
summary: Albemarle Corporation (NYSE:ALB) is one of the stocks on Jim Cramer’s radar. During the lightning round, a caller asked about the company, and Cramer commented: “No, it’s too, we’re not going to go there. It’s too volatile and too hard to actually nail down. I’m going to say skip that one.” Albemarle Corporation (NYSE:ALB) produces […]
